captions.text: NARRATOR: This is a story about stick figures who live
in a world full of monsters andexplosions and raccoons

and a lot of other
cool stuff too.

And it all takes place
on a little planet we

-(ASIAN ACCENT) I can't
wait for lunch.

Do you think there are going to
be boys at this school or
-(ASIAN ACCENT) If you're happy and you know it, clap

-My mom says those turn
you into a whore.
Say, there's a young jerk face looking for you.
Says he wants to beat your back until you die.
-Must be 'cause otherwise you'dknow that this seesaw's

Price for playing on the
fifth grade playground

Well let's see if you're
fist-tose intolerant.

-My mom says I drink
too much water.

That's how come I cry
so much and pee.

-You know, I got held
back five years,

Old MacDonald had a farm, now
you're going to die, nerd!

No matter what happens,
I promise I will
